message.content: Alcatraz Island is a small island located in the San Francisco Bay. It is famous for housing the notorious Alcatraz Federal Penitentiary from 1934 to 1963. The prison was known for holding some of the most dangerous criminals in the United States. Alcatraz Island is now a popular tourist attraction, drawing visitors who are interested in its rich history and the infamous escape attempts made by prisoners.
